Our Partners

We partner with organisations that live and breathe the same values as us.

HelpBnk (and Simon Squibb)

We're working with HelpBnk and Simon Squibb to empower communities and make giving easier for everyone.

Team Arbor

Team Arbor and Hitchr are collaborating to promote sustainable mobility and environmental stewardship.

Honest Days Work design

Honest Days Work design helps us create delightful, user-focused experiences for our community.

Benefits of Partnership

Expanded Reach

Access our growing community of riders and drivers.

Innovation

Collaborate on cutting-edge transportation solutions.

Growth

Scale your business with our proven platform.
